Articles.Content:
Hi all !

Hope your all well, im a massssive fan of KSP, I was wondering if it would be possible to make a MechJeb thats tiny and can be fixed to the command module without it being noticible (very thin)...I usually just use the standard mechjeb but dont like how its doors open and stuff when its in use, its an awesome tool but I dont want to see it so to speak, any ideas?

Thanks
I want something like this, too, actually. I hope they make it. Good suggestion.
Isn\'t there already one? The MechJeb in the AR202 casing, unless I remember incorrectly.

Isn\'t there already one? The MechJeb in the AR202 casing, unless I remember incorrectly.

Hmm not seen that, im intruiged though, iv found nothing that will fit on a capsule other than underneath it.

Hmm not seen that, im intruiged though, iv found nothing that will fit on a capsule other than underneath it.

Its in there on the latest mechjeb (has been for months). Its shapped like a box. It fits kerbal style very well in my opinion.

Also it has a light. Turns green when its ON turns red when its OFF
There\'s also a slightly smaller, more futuristic-looking radial Mechjeb, but it opens up when you use it. And there\'s one that stacks on top of the command module and is really hard to notice.
I personally like the staring eye MechJeb capsule myself. ???
Sadly none of them will attach to the CM because for some reason command modules have a no-radial-attach rule.

You can turn any part into a MechJeb by editing the cfg file to with the following line:

module = MuMechJeb

Sadly none of them will attach to the CM because for some reason command modules have a no-radial-attach rule.

You could change the command module\'s part.cfg to allow surface attachments.
You can turn anything into a mechjeb, if you want to.

You can turn anything into a mechjeb, if you want to.

TELL ME HOW NAO

TELL ME HOW NAO

Edit the part.cfg file, and make sure that \'module = MuMechJeb\'

TELL ME HOW NAO

1. Nibb explained it a few posts before you.

2. Ask nicely.

You can turn any part into a MechJeb by editing the cfg file to with the following line:

module = MuMechJeb

I tried this and every part I do it to ceases to exist in the game...
Wait, Isnt there that tiny little MechJeb part for the Capsule in Kosmos pack?!Im sure that could be used

You can actually turn a command pod into a mechjeb, but then you won\'t have any Kerbs.

module=mumechjebpod

You can actually turn a command pod into a mechjeb, but then you won\'t have any Kerbs.

module=mumechjebpod

WAIT really???? It gets rid of the kerbals in the corner?

Or are you just saying its an 'unmanned flight' at that point?

WAIT really???? It gets rid of the kerbals in the corner?

Or are you just saying its an 'unmanned flight' at that point?

It gets rid of the Kerbals in the corner.

Therefore, \'tis unmanned.

Wait, Isnt there that tiny little MechJeb part for the Capsule in Kosmos pack?!Im sure that could be used

Yeah, it\'s in the Kosomos pack
I duplicated the Linear Port RCS thruster and turned the copy into a mech jeb. Surface attachment is on all of my Command Pods, too.
